mapper.sql: SELECT FILE.FILE_SEQ AS fileSeq , FILE.FILE_ORG_NM AS fileOrgNm , FILE.FILE_REAL_NM AS fileRealNm , FILE.FILE_REAL_PATH AS fileRealPath , CONCAT('/', FILE.FILE_SEQ) AS fileDownloadUri , DATE_FORMAT(FILE.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(FILE.REG_SEQ) AS regNm FROM TB_FILE FILE WHERE FILE.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FILE FILE, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM , FILE_ORD.FILE_REF_TB , FILE_ORD.FILE_REF_COL , FILE_ORD.FILE_REF_SEQ , FILE_ORD.FILE_SEQ FROM TB_FILE FILE_ORD, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) RN WHERE FILE_ORD.FILE_REF_TB = #{fileRefTb} AND FILE_ORD.FILE_REF_COL = #{fileRefCol} AND FILE_ORD.FILE_REF_SEQ = #{fileRefSeq} ORDER BY FILE_ORD.FILE_SEQ) AS R SET FILE.FILE_ORDER_NO = R.ROWNUM WHERE FILE.FILE_REF_TB = R.FILE_REF_TB AND FILE.FILE_REF_COL = R.FILE_REF_COL AND FILE.FILE_REF_SEQ = R.FILE_REF_SEQ AND FILE.FILE_SEQ = R.FILE_SEQ
